code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{Box,Button,Container,TextField,Typography,Paper,Grid,IconButton,Snackbar,Alert}from'@mui/material';import VideocamIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Videocam';import ChatIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Chat';import ContentCopyIcon from'@mui/icons-material/ContentCopy';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[roomId,setRoomId]=useState('');const[showCopiedAlert,setShowCopiedAlert]=useState(false);const handleJoinCall=()=>{if(username&&roomId){navigate(`/video-call/${roomId}`);}};const handleStartChat=()=>{if(username){navigate('/chat');}};const copyRoomId=()=>{if(roomId){navigator.clipboard.writeText(roomId);setShowCopiedAlert(true);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{maxWidth:"md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{mt:8,textAlign:'center'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h3",component:"h1",gutterBottom:true,children:"Video Call & Chat"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",color:"text.secondary",paragraph:true,children:"Connect with friends and colleagues through video calls and chat"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{container:true,spacing:4,sx:{mt:4},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:12,md:6,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Paper,{sx:{p:4},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h5",gutterBottom:true,children:"Start or Join a Video Call"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body2",color:"text.secondary",paragraph:true,children:"To start a call, enter your name and create a room ID. Share the room ID with others to join the same call."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{mt:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{fullWidth:true,label:"Your Name",variant:"outlined",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),sx:{mb:2}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',gap:1,mb:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{fullWidth:true,label:"Room ID",variant:"outlined",value:roomId,onChange:e=>setRoomId(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{onClick:copyRoomId,disabled:!roomId,color:"primary",sx:{mt:1},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ContentCopyIcon,{})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{fullWidth:true,variant:"contained",color:"primary",startIcon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VideocamIcon,{}),onClick:handleJoinCall,disabled:!username||!roomId,children:"Join Call"})]})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:12,md:6,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Paper,{sx:{p:4},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h5",gutterBottom:true,children:"Start Chatting"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body2",color:"text.secondary",paragraph:true,children:"Enter your name to start chatting with other users in the application."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{mt:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{fullWidth:true,label:"Your Name",variant:"outlined",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),sx:{mb:2}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{fullWidth:true,variant:"contained",color:"secondary",startIcon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChatIcon,{}),onClick:handleStartChat,disabled:!username,children:"Start Chat"})]})]})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Snackbar,{open:showCopiedAlert,autoHideDuration:3000,onClose:()=>setShowCopiedAlert(false),anchorOrigin:{vertical:'bottom',horizontal:'center'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Alert,{onClose:()=>setShowCopiedAlert(false),severity:"success",children:"Room ID copied to clipboard!"})})]});};export default Home;
